actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To require the President to submit a National Energy Policy Plan, together with implementing legislation, to the Congress by March 31, 1991, and biennially thereafter through 1999, that will provide for energy self-sufficiency for the United States by the year 2000.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Energy Organization Act to direct the President to submit a National Energy Policy Plan biennially to the Congress that will provide for energy self-sufficiency by the year 2000.

titles.title: To require the President to submit a National Energy Policy Plan, together with implementing legislation, to the Congress by March 31, 1991, and biennially thereafter through 1999, that will provide for energy self-sufficiency for the United States by the year 2000.
